pros: Great Place to work on something.
cons: None. They can continue the good job.

review_title: It was good hand experience to handle the work and pressure of the same and thereby having gr8 learning being a fresher.
pros: I am a BCA graduate and I worked in the college as BCA Lab In-Charge cum Software Instructor. As the job was from my sector and of my choice, I opted for the job. I left the job as I had decided to do my PGDM which I am currently doing from Jaipuria Institute of Management, Indore.
cons: The downsides of Patna Science College was its infrastructure as it was not up to today's need. Besides any improvement was not being made quickly. It was sometime difficult to work with backward system.
